gameplayModel

Class Minvo

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplayModel.GridObject
      • gameplayModel.AnimatedObject
        • gameplayModel.Enemy
          • gameplayModel.Minvo

  • public class Minvo
extends Enemy
    This class defined the the enemy type "Minvo". It defined all of the initializing parameter of this enemy type which includes the number of points players gain if killed, the speed it moves at, the AI "smartnesss" of it, and the wall-passing capabilities.
    Author:
    Chao Yue, Olivier Laforest
